DataElement.preferredName: Vascular Patient Self-Report Disease or Disorder Yes or No Response
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Relating to or containing blood vessels. Subjective reports made by a patient. Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function. A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no
